casebody.data:
Ian Bass v. Pine Hill Golf Club, Inc. (5183)

Hull, Daly and Bieluch, Js.

Submitted on briefs December 12 decision released December 16, 1986 *813Stephen Fournier filed a brief for the appellant (defendant). James C. Malholland filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

This appeal is controlled by the opinion of the Supreme Court in Stock v. Cobb, 169 Conn. 638, 363 A.2d 1118 (1975). See B/M Redev. Corporation v. Serrano, 3 Conn. App. 409, 488 A.2d 848 (1985).

There is no error.
